title: Beautiful Letter Q Options
content:
Hello,

I'm looking for letter Q options. I only have Miller, Requiem and the like for comparison, but I'm looking for something more ornate/interesting.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Q.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022754/http:/typophile.com/files/Q.jpg) | 79.6 KB |
author: talgoretsky

comments.content:
If you'd end up having to buy a font just for the "Q", it might be cheaper to commission the perfect "Q"!

hhp

I made a font called Desire that some ornate Q's that you may like.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/desire/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022754/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/desire/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/desire/")
